name: Esportlivescore Dark Theme
description: Dark theme for esportlivescore.com. (working on the chat, but currently you'll need to hide it)
additional_info:
Version 1.0: Released

Version 1.1: Fixed fanobet odds

Version 1.2: Fixed tons of little things. Like team info and comments.

Version 1.3: Fixed some new css classes. Team details is now dark again :)

Version 1.4: Fixed some new css classes again. Game selection sidebar is now dark themed again. The Arrows in the bottom is now in a grey color.

Version 1.5: Fixed the live streaming tab.
